messages.message:
I removed port 6831 in `jaeger-all-in-one`
```run-docker: build-env-docker
	# we exposing ports other than frontend for jaeger_agent,
	# config, collector, and metrics respectively.
	$(DOCKER_RUN_CMD) --name instabase-$(IMAGE_NAME) \
	--env-file $(current_dir)/tmp/docker_env_local.list \
	-e QUERY_BASE_PATH=/jaeger \
	-e JAEGER_DISABLED=true \
	-p ${PORT}:${PORT} \
	-p 5778:5778 \
	-p 14268:14268 \
	-p 14269:14269 \
	-p 9411:9411 \
	-e COLLECTOR_ZIPKIN_HOST_PORT="0.0.0.0:9411" \
	--rm -t -i instabase/$(IMAGE_NAME)```
but I'm getting this from `jaeger-agent`
```docker: Error response from daemon: driver failed programming external connectivity on endpoint instabase-jaeger-agent (7ea1c372bdb2815742ce7a061dd60b058ab19aca94e710a998fde26f11245f43): Bind for 0.0.0.0:5778 failed: port is already allocated```
If I remove `-p 5778:5778 \` in `jaeger-all-in-one` , I get a different error from `jaeger-agent`

```{"level":"fatal","ts":1750267984.393236,"caller":"agent/main.go:69","msg":"Failed to create collector proxy","error":"at least one collector hostPort address is required when resolver is not available","stacktrace":"main.main.func1\n\tgithub.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/cmd/agent/main.go:69 (http://tgithub.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/cmd/agent/main.go:69)\ngithub.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute\n\tgithub.com/spf13/cobra@v1.8.1/command.go:985\ngithub.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC\n\tgithub.com/spf13/cobra@v1.8.1/command.go:1117\ngithub.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute\n\tgithub.com/spf13/cobra@v1.8.1/command.go:1041\nmain.main\n\tgithub.com/jaegertracing/jaeger/cmd/agent/main.go:106\nruntime.main\n\truntime/proc.go:272"}```
This might be trickier than I thought :blob_sad:, I'll try finding a solution tomorrow
